_comments.base_url: Base URL for your Agiloft instance REST API endpoint
_comments.username: Your Agiloft username (required for legacy auth)
_comments.password: Your Agiloft password (required for legacy auth, consider using AGILOFT_PASSWORD environment variable)

oauth2.client_id: OAuth2 Client ID from Agiloft OAuth2 Client Setup
oauth2.client_secret: OAuth2 Client Secret (consider using AGILOFT_OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET environment variable)
